data.name: PANDO Engines
data.detailed_description:
PANDO Engines is 2.5D, cooperative party game where players work together to create their own massive land engine. Enter post-apocalyptic British Columbia frozen in the midst of a nuclear winter. 100 years following the blasts, of 2178, PANDO’s (Population Assembly Nucleotide Development Organization) cloning facility opens, releasing the first wave of untouched humans since the nuclear war. Tasked by your creators with bringing order to the world, work together with your team navigating the hostile terrain in your mobile fortress. Weather the different pseudo-random threats by manning turrets, putting out fires, shoveling coal, repairing segments, and performing daily maintenance. How long will you survive?

Main Features
  • Online Co-OP
  • Modular Ship Building
  • Chaotic Task Management
  • Random Events

data.short_description: A 2.5D, Online Co-op Party Game where players work together to create their own massive land engine. Whether the different threats by manning turrets, putting out fires, shoveling coal, repairing segments, and performing daily maintenance. How long will you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Inel(R) Core(TM) i5-1135G7 @ 2.4GHz 2.42GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: intel iris xe graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10700F - Core i7 10th Gen @ 2.9 GHz
  • Graphics: EVGA GeForce GTX 980 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
